reviewText: similar to it's counterpart (Toxie's Top 10), the movies in here are your basic essentials for Troma flicks. You'll probably end up watching the movies once or twice, then leaving the case out for display as more of a collection piece than anything else.
Not for everybody, but if you are a Troma fan you will dig it. Nice packaging, makes a nice display.

Toxie Blood Bank 10 Disc Collector's Set A piece of garbage from start to finish. I mean the visual quality of the movies themselves are sub-par. I mean, I am a huge fan of crappy B movies from the 80's and I watched all of these movies and threw them away. Keep your money in your pocket on this one.

I bought this set and let it sit for awhile. I enjoy Troma films but never really have the chance to view the films until recently. I will admit some are very good but a few are plain bad. Nightmare Weekend had some gore and nudity but it was a beyond bad movie. The best movies in this set are Mommy's Epitaph, Scream Baby Scream, and Chillers. Chillers is like a low budget version of Creepshow but is actully better then Creepshow. The ending to that movie was a pleaseant surprise. Very good set from Troma and highly recommended.

Here's what's in the set:

HORROR OF THE HUNGRY HUMONGOUS HUNGAN
BEYOND EVIL
EVIL CLUTCH
NIGHTMARE WEEKEND
MOMMY'S EPITAPH
PLAY DEAD
DEATH BY DIALOGUE
NIGHTFALL
CHILLERS
SCREAM BABY SCREAM
